rooms.description: Modern reception area with built-in storage and seating arrangement. Vastu-compliant east facing entrance.
Spacious living room with open plan design. Features luxury finishes and ample natural light from south-facing windows.
Dining area adjoining the living room, ideal for family gatherings. Incorporates a central dining table with a view of the garden.
Fully equipped modern kitchen with island counter and integrated appliances. Utilizes energy-efficient lighting and south-west positioning for positive Vastu influence.
Dedicated library space designed for quiet study or reading. Includes built-in bookshelves and a comfortable seating area; positioned in the northeast to encourage knowledge.
Serviceable utility room with laundry facilities and storage for cleaning supplies. Vastu placement on the west side enhances balance.

openings.description: Large windows ensuring ample daylight and ventilation. Vastu guidelines recommend south and east openings.
Reinforced glass front door designed to enhance security and align with Vastu principles for positive energy entry.
Balcony that overlooks the garden and swimming pool area, providing a relaxing outdoor space.

rooms.description: Luxurious master suite with en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. Vastu recommends south-east placement for prosperity.
Additional bedroom designed for joint family members; offers ample space and natural light.
Second additional bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort. Placed according to Vastu guidelines to promote balance.
Smaller bedroom intended for guests or children; ensures flexibility in space utilization.
Dedicated dressing area adjacent to the master bedroom. Enhances convenience and luxury feel.

openings.description: Large windows in the master bedroom for privacy and optimal ventilation; placed per Vastu recommendations.
Balconies attached to some bedrooms offering scenic views of the garden and swimming pool, designed with privacy screens.

rooms.description: Guest suite offering a comfortable stay for visitors. Includes small living space and attached bathroom.
Multi-purpose storage room for seasonal items, enhancing functionality of the bungalow design.

openings.description: Windows designed to ensure adequate ventilation in the guest suite; Vastu guidelines suggest north-facing openings.
Secure entrance to the swimming pool area integrated with the garden. Vastu principles encourage east-facing entrances for prosperity.
